mapper.insert: insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, deposit, rentmoney, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dealcate, housecate) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{deposit}, #{rentMoney}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gunguCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, "rent", "office")

insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, dealamount, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dealcate, housecate) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{dealAmount}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gunguCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, "deal", "office")
